item.title: Home 29
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[rev_slider alias="niches_24_vacuumleaner" slidertitle="Home 29 Vacuumleaner"][/rev_slider]

The Ultimate Navigating Wi-fi Connected Robot Vacuum.

The robot vacuums with Wi-Fi connectivity let you control your robot with your smartphone. Clean from anywhere with the mobile app – including when you’re not at home. Start, stop, pause, schedule, and receive notifications wherever you are.

Everyday clean without the effort

Pet hair, crumbs, dirt, and daily dust are always building up, so keeping your home clean can feel like a never-ending task.

  • 24
  • hour

Time
Reservation

Various cleaning modes

Combining a powerful cleaning system with intelligent sensors, our robots move seamlessly through your home

Fixed-point cleaning

Bow type cleaning

Edgewise sweeping

Free sweeping

Handle various surfaces easily

The robot automatically adjusts brush height to ensure optimum
performance, transitioning smoothly between hardwood, area rugs, tile,
carpet, and other floor types.

Short Plush Carpet

Wood Floor

Marble Floor

Tile Floor

Wall-following technology

Pet hair, crumbs, dirt, and daily dust are always building up, so keeping your home clean can feel like a never-ending task.

  • play video

Quietly give you a clean house

Combining a powerful cleaning system with intelligent sensors, our robots move seamlessly through your home

0-40
dB

Very quiet

< 50
dB

Working

50-60
dB

Normal

>65
dB

Loud noise

Endurance upgrade

Large capacity lithium battery life lasting attenuation,large-sized apartment cleaning is no longer a problem

0 mAh Battery capacity 0 min Endurance about 0 m2 Applicable area about

What’s in the box

Intro price

$102.99

Order Now
